articles.title: Spike in stroke deaths in patients with only minor coronavirus symptoms - The Independent
articles.description: Reports of strokes in the young and middle-aged are the latest twist in our evolving understanding of the mysteries of the virus, finds Ariana Eunjung Cha
articles.content:

articles.title: How close are we to a coronavirus vaccine? Latest news on UK trials - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Latest news on the search for a vaccine against the new coronavirus
articles.content:
As Covid-19 has rapidly spread around the world there has been a mad scramble to find a vaccine. 
In the UK on April 23, a potential coronavirus vaccine being developed at the University of Oxford began human trials.
